actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to punish as a Federal criminal offense the crimes of international parental abduction.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to establish the offense of international parental child abduction. Lists certain affirmative defenses to such offense, which include: (1) acting within the provisions of a valid court order granting the defendant legal custody or visitation rights; and (2) fleeing an incidence or pattern of domestic violence.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to punish as a Federal criminal offense the crimes of international parental abduction.
